title: The Last of Us Episode 8 BREAKDOWN w/ Troy Baker (FULL SPOILERS)
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Tim Gettys, Andy Cortez, and Blessing Adeoye Jr. are joined by Troy Baker to break down the latest episode of HBO's The Last of Us starring Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey.

New after show analysis LIVE every Monday at 9AM PT on http://youtube.com/kindafunny.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
